# rallicagram

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`rallicaggram` calls the Gallicagram API directly from R. Gallicagram enables to build time series of keywords used in a set of French corpora.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rallicagram from [GitHub](https://github.com/vincentbagilet/rallicagram) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("vincentbagilet/rallicagram")
```
